name: KEEPS DEATH H!S WATCH: Demo 3.0.
description:
This game is best enjoyed after playing Its First Demo, which will provide ample background aesthetically and cognitively. 

This demo is prone to revision and slated for some expansion. That notwithstanding, the creators have deemed it to be sufficiently adherent to the Project's Long-Term Vision, as well as palatable for consumption.

Hiring for Visual Artists and auxiliary Sound Designers is ongoing; inquire within the Comments Section.

Visual Assets and Sound Effects are pending; again, Demo 1.0 provides a better glimpse into the Multimedia World I am creating.

Regards,

Rinzai Gigen.

Subliminal Mind Games.

[({R.G.||S.M.G.)}]
